description:
Hike, chop wood, or apres-ski more comfortably with this puffy vest. A thermal-reflective lining and synthetic insulation seals in the warmth. This vest can comfortably withstand a light snowfall or drizzle with a water-resistant outer layer.
Zip-up pockets and an interior security pocket means valuables can be easily stashed.
name: Columbia Sportswear Powder Lite Vest - Tall - Mens
